concept.concept_desc: CCS->Theory of computation->Design and analysis of algorithms->Parallel algorithms
CCS->Theory of computation->Models of computation->Concurrency->Parallel computing models

au.affiliation: Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, University of Massachusetts, Amherst, Mass.
